extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A grade of C- in SOCY 122/6.0.

basic.description: A discussion of the central concepts in sociological theory, for example, agency and structure; rationality, reason, and abstraction; social continuity and social change; subjectivity and selfhood; language and interpretation are normally considered.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Central Concepts in Sociological Theory
